document.full_text: third seed andy roddick became the first player into the quarter-finals of the queen's club championships with a comfortable 6-4 6-4 win against giant south african kevin anderson on thursday.
document.title: roddick into last eight at queen's
lines_and_colors: third seed andy roddick became the first player into the quarter-finals of the queen's club championships with a comfortable 6-4 6-4 win against giant south african kevin anderson on thursday.
